author: GERALD HERBERT and STACEY PLAISANCE / AP
title: Louisiana Pastor Flouting Public Health Orders With Large Church Services Arrested Over ‘Aggravated Assault’ of Protestor
description: Tony Speed, of the Life Tabernacle Church, was later released on bail
content: (BATON ROUGE, La.) Louisiana authorities arrested a pastor on an assault charge on Tuesday after he admitted that he drove his church bus toward a man who has been protesting his decision to hold mass gatherings in defiance of public health orders during the … [+3917 chars]
